snippet.title: d20: Sweet Roll Club [Greenlight Trailer]
snippet.description:
Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=935076984
Genre: visual novel, ADV, quest, fantasy, school, romance, yuri (shojo-ai), girl's love, ecchi.

Young Tomoko is having troubles finding friends and succeeding in studies, but her imagination is far from ordinary. With it, she is able to bring magic into most common places: school yard becomes a dark forest with dragons, library - warlock's ominous abode, school corridors - ancient dungeons... However, most of the girls at high school have already grown out of silly fantasies.

One day, Tomoko discovers that there are 4 other girls in her school imagining themselves to be brave warriors, powerful wizards and righteous paladins. Together, they decide to from a tabletop role-playing club, where they dont have to hide their dreams of magic and adventures.
